tgt_original: yogatantreṣu sarveṣu śasyate yoginā sadā ||  eṣāṁ caturṇāṁ yogānāṁ ( upāyānāṁ )  nāmāni dattāni tatraiva- sevāvidhānaṁ prathamaṁ dvitīyamupasādhanam |
sādhanantu tṛtīyaṁ vai mahāsādhanaṁ caturthakam ||  utpattikramasya sevopasādhanasādhanamahāsādhanabhedāt sādhanacatuṣṭayamasti |
utpattiniṣpannakramayorbhedāt sevā'pi dvidhā |  samājottaratantre'bhihitaṁ yat - sāmānyottamabhedena sevā tu dvividhā bhavet |
